1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Value of some types.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Overture.Value
6 ( Value (..),
7 ) where
8
9import Data.Text         as Tx
10import Data.Text.Lazy    as Tz
11
12-- | Value of some types.
13data Value
14    = VEmpty            -- ^ Empty
15    | VBool Bool        -- ^ Boolean
16    | VInt Int          -- ^ Integer
17    | VInteger Integer  -- ^ Integer
18    | VStr String       -- ^ Text
19    | VTx Tx.Text       -- ^ Strict text
20    | VTz Tz.Text       -- ^ Lazy text
21    | VList [Value]     -- ^ List of values
22      deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
23
